languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Wielder`s {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} enemy with a Precise Shot reduce enemy`s {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflection{/g} by 1 and applies 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Exploit{/g} until the end of combat. The {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} stacks up to 3 times.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点，并获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。最多叠加3层。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}致命射击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}降低1点，并获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。最多叠加3层。

languages.text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}を敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させるたび、戦闘終了まで敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を1減らし、{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を1付与する。3回までスタック可能。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}デッドアイショット{/g}を敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させるたび、戦闘終了まで敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を1減らし、{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}を1付与する。3回までスタック可能。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g}, reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del enemigo en −1 y le aplica +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}disparo certero{/g}, reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del enemigo en −1 y le aplica +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto se acumula un máximo de 3 veces.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}treffsicheren Schuss{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, reduziert er dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 und wendet +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} an. Bis zu 3-mal stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye Shot{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, reduziert er dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −1 und wendet +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} an.

languages.text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельным{/g} выстрелом, персонаж до конца боя уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} цели на 1 и накладывает на нее +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельным выстрелом{/g}, персонаж до конца боя уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} цели на 1 и накладывает на нее +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз.

Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}прицельным выстрелом{/g}, персонаж до конца боя уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} цели на 1 и накладывает на нее +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}. Суммируется до 3 раз.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi avec la capacité {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Tir de précision{/g}, celle-ci réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ennemi de −1 et lui applique +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable 3 fois.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} un ennemi avec la capacité {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Tir de Précision{/g}, celle-ci réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de l'ennemi de -1 et lui applique +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable 3 fois.
